item.title: GM
item.description: score:138 Chances: General Motors Co. reported a 14.1% increase in US vehicle sales in 2023, showing strong momentum for the company. The debut of the Corvette E-Ray, the first-ever hybrid Corvette, indicates GM’s commitment to innovation and future-focused vehicle development. GM’s offering of $7,500 incentives on its electric vehicles, despite the loss of a U.
